title: Protecting your boat during a flood.

content.text: The Environment Agency (EA) is one of the Navigation Authorities. During a flood, the Environment Agency encourages people to protect themselves and plan. Here, Environment Agency staff member Jon Naylor reflects on his experience of owning a boat, and what to do in a flood.
Riding the tide: My experience owning a boat on the River Thames during a flood

Owning a boat on the River Thames has always been a source of joy and tranquillity for me. However, when the threat of a flood becomes imminent, it brings some challenges. Here’s how I prepare and protect my boat during this stressful time.
